name: node-bravia-ip-control-simple
description: The node-bravia-ip-control-simple is a Node.js module which is a pure javascript implementation of the Simple IP Control for SONY BRAVIA Professional Displays. You can control BRAVIA Professional Displays in local network easily using this module.
author: Futomi Hatano <futomi.hatano@gmail.com> (https://github.com/futomi)
